alert.note: Alert for Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHAMPTON...WESTERN HERTFORD... GREENSVILLE...SOUTHWESTERN SOUTHAMPTON AND SOUTHERN BRUNSWICK COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF EMPORIA THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Norlina to near Roanoke Rapids to near Rich Square. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Roanoke Rapids, Garysburg, Rich Square, Gaston, and Woodland around 555 PM EDT. Gasburg and Ebony around 600 PM EDT. Seaboard and Barley around 605 PM EDT. Dahlia, Brunswick, and Conway around 610 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Eagletown, Milwaukee, Adams Grove, Gum Forks, Bufford Crossroads, Lanes Corner, Menola, Bowens Corner, Henrico, and Mapleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
